Celo | San Francisco & Berlin | Software Engineer & Mobile Engineer | All Levels | 100K - 200K + equity + coins | FULLTIME, INTERNS, ONSITE, VISA | https://celo.org Founded by serial entrepreneurs, Celo is a new company aiming to remove the barriers for large-scale adoption of cryptocurrencies as means-of-payment. Using a novel address-based encryption algorithm, Celo makes sending money as easy as sending a text. Additionally, Celo uses stable-value tokens pegged to fiat currencies, like the US Dollar, to minimize volatility. Anyone can participate in the network and earn Celo currency, even with just a budget Android smartphone. The first application launching on our platform is a social payment and money transfer app, aimed at developing markets.

Investors: a16z, Polychain, General Catalyst, Coinbase, Reid Hoffman and Jack Dorsey, among others.

Stack: Typescript, Solidity, Go, React Native, Python, Android, iOS

We tried to make applying fun: 'Mine' your application form to create an applicant blockchain at the bottom of our jobs page: https://celo.org/jobs
